meanings.sent1: The soldier looked sharp in his epauletted uniform.
meanings.sent2: The epauletted captain led the troops into battle.
meanings.sent3: The epauletted officer's cat tried to wear tiny epaulettes too.
meanings.sent4: The epauletted general stood out like a shining star among the troops.
meanings.sent5: The epauletted jacket added a touch of elegance to his outfit.

meanings.sent1: The epauletted shoulders of the coat gave it a military look.
meanings.sent2: The epauletted uniform was a symbol of authority.
meanings.sent3: The epauletted mannequin in the store seemed ready for a fashion battle.
meanings.sent4: The epauletted costume made him feel like a hero from a storybook.
meanings.sent5: The epauletted design on the jacket made it stand out in the crowd.
